title: Himber Dinger's Wrench Icon
body: How come i did not receive the wrench icon when i was accepted into the alpha (and used it) ? If this was just an incident can i receive it please? Thank you!

replies.body:
We may have accidentally missed you. Our bad! If you submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be able to see what we can do for ya.

Let me know if you have any questions.
